subheadline: We design websites for companies, organizations, and personal portfolios. We build and customize WordPress themes and scripts.
products.headline: Themes & plugins
checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.instructions: Themes & plugins, details and installation instructions will be sent via email. For further help, please contact us.
checkout.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email to complete the order.
bitcoin.title: Pay with Bitcoin
bitcoin.instructions_suffix: to the Bitcoin address below. If your wallet supports scanning a QR code, scan it. Otherwise copy the address and paste it into your wallet.
bitcoin.no_address_instructions: Please set NEXT_PUBLIC_BITCOIN_ADDRESS in your environment and place your QR code at /public/payments/qr-code.svg.
checkout.cart_empty: Add an item to your shopping cart!
confirmation.order_ref_instructions: (please keep it for any inquiry or issue)
confirmation.bitcoin_pending_body: We've received your Bitcoin payment request. We'll check the transaction and you'll receive a confirmation email shortly.
contact.name: Name
contact.error_send: Failed to send message. Please try again.
contact.error_network: An error occurred while sending. Please try again.
contact.success: Your message was sent successfully. We'll reply by email.
